#include <stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
 
int main(void) {
    long int t,n,p,term;
    char str[5];
    scanf("%ld",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%ld %s %ld",&n,str,&p);
        if(strcmp(str,"odd")==0)
        {
            term=2*p;
            printf("%ld\n",term);
        }
        else
        {
            term=(p-1)*2+1;
            printf("%ld\n",term);
        }
    }
	
	return 0;
}
